channel.title: Himat版 Steam 新規ストア公開（画像＋説明）
channel.description: Games whose Steam store page just went public (detected)

item.title: Castle Siege（新規追加）
item.description: An army of knights clashes to reclaim their stolen kingdom, fearing their enemy has made a terrible discovery. Immerse yourself into thrilling, action-packed medieval warfare, set in a breathtakingly epic world!"
item.content:encoded:
An army of knights clashes to reclaim their stolen kingdom, fearing their enemy has made a terrible discovery. Immerse yourself into thrilling, action-packed medieval warfare, set in a breathtakingly epic world!"

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Exit 3A: The Game（新規追加）
item.description: Experience Charlotte, NC's infamous infrastructure from the safety of your home! Discover why locals call it "an absolute nightmare" while you dodge traffic and hold on to your cargo. Master the arcade physics, climb the leaderboards and learn what it takes to become a true Charlottean!
item.content:encoded:
Experience Charlotte, NC's infamous infrastructure from the safety of your home! Discover why locals call it "an absolute nightmare" while you dodge traffic and hold on to your cargo. Master the arcade physics, climb the leaderboards and learn what it takes to become a true Charlottean!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: PISO 6（新規追加）
item.description: PISO 6 is a first-person psychological horror game with a low-poly aesthetic. After his father’s death, Tomás returns to the apartment where he grew up. What seemed like a simple search for a will turns into a nightmare that pulls him back into the past.
item.content:encoded:
PISO 6 is a first-person psychological horror game with a low-poly aesthetic. After his father’s death, Tomás returns to the apartment where he grew up. What seemed like a simple search for a will turns into a nightmare that pulls him back into the past.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Backroom:Gone（新規追加）
item.description: 당신은 연구원입니다. 연구를 하던 중 두통에 잠에 빠지게 됩니다. 잠에서 꺠자 알 수 없는 장소가 나왔고, 무서운 소리가 들립니다. 한 발짝 나아가니 연기 속에 묻힌 괴생명체가 보이고 탈출해야 합니다.
item.content:encoded:
당신은 연구원입니다. 연구를 하던 중 두통에 잠에 빠지게 됩니다. 잠에서 꺠자 알 수 없는 장소가 나왔고, 무서운 소리가 들립니다. 한 발짝 나아가니 연기 속에 묻힌 괴생명체가 보이고 탈출해야 합니다.

item.title: Tales of Xillia Remastered（新規追加）
item.description: Experience Tales of Xillia, remastered for the first time ever. Dive into the magnificent world of Rieze Maxia as either Jude Mathis, an aspiring medical student from the capital, or Milla Maxwell, a mysterious woman accompanied by four powerful spirits.

item.title: Arsonist '24 Director's Cut（新規追加）
item.description: Between the yellowed letters and bloody mysteries of the past, something horrible is wandering around. It's not happy to see any guests. It's hungry. And it KNOWS, that you're already here. Your job is to uncover the secrets of this place and its Inhabitants in our new first-person horror game!
item.content:encoded:
Between the yellowed letters and bloody mysteries of the past, something horrible is wandering around. It's not happy to see any guests. It's hungry. And it KNOWS, that you're already here. Your job is to uncover the secrets of this place and its Inhabitants in our new first-person horror game!

item.title: Froggy: Jelly Punch（新規追加）
item.description: A 2.5D beat ’em up where a brave frog battles strange living junk from the city dump to rescue his beloved. Fast, colorful, and a little bit ridiculous – a fight for love, honor, and the peace of his swamp.

item.title: Salvage Unlimited（新規追加）
item.description: Salvage Unlimited puts you in the captain’s seat of a small salvage company. Accept contracts, use your boat’s sonar to locate wrecks hidden beneath the water, and bring your finds back to port to complete jobs. Buy, sell, and upgrade your fleet to take on bigger contracts and earn greater rewards.
item.content:encoded:
Salvage Unlimited puts you in the captain’s seat of a small salvage company. Accept contracts, use your boat’s sonar to locate wrecks hidden beneath the water, and bring your finds back to port to complete jobs. Buy, sell, and upgrade your fleet to take on bigger contracts and earn greater rewards.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Tactical Assault VR - Operation: Dahlia DLC（新規追加）
item.description: The Operation: Dahlia DLC is an expansion pack containing 5 all new missions, a new multiplayer lobby/social hub (with basketball court and outdoor shooting range), new weapons, and an ample amount of new cosmetics dedicated to the LEO (Law Enforcement Officer)/SWAT theme.
item.content:encoded:
The Operation: Dahlia DLC is an expansion pack containing 5 all new missions, a new multiplayer lobby/social hub (with basketball court and outdoor shooting range), new weapons, and an ample amount of new cosmetics dedicated to the LEO (Law Enforcement Officer)/SWAT theme.

item.description: Shoot Ogres and race to upgrade your base and equipment before getting overrun. Discover ancient secrets to unlock more powerful weapons and find the key to your survival.

item.title: Ice Core Tower Defense（新規追加）
item.description: Stand as the last ice tower defending Earth from endless magma circle invaders! Master auto or manual fire modes, unlock 600+ skills, and devastating special attacks like Chain Lightning and Area Frost Explosions. The ultimate elemental tower defense experience!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Sprint 0（新規追加）
item.description: The rules are simple: watch, remember, report. Keep your eyes sharp—the anomalies are waiting to be found. Fail your task, and you may never escape the office.

item.title: Deadcave（新規追加）
item.description: DEADCAVE is a fast-paced 2D pixel-art endless shooter where you slash enemies with your sword, deflect bullets, collect weapons, and survive against relentless waves in dark underground caves.
item.content:encoded:
DEADCAVE is a fast-paced 2D pixel-art endless shooter where you slash enemies with your sword, deflect bullets, collect weapons, and survive against relentless waves in dark underground caves.

item.title: Snack Shop Simulator（新規追加）
item.description: Eat snacks and run your own snack shop! There are many kinds of snacks: chips, candys, sodas, ice creams and so on. You are expected to be a cashier, a stocker and a feeder, until automation is unlocked. Hire cashiers, stockers and feeders, even a manager, sit down, eat snacks and win the money.
item.content:encoded:
Eat snacks and run your own snack shop! There are many kinds of snacks: chips, candys, sodas, ice creams and so on. You are expected to be a cashier, a stocker and a feeder, until automation is unlocked. Hire cashiers, stockers and feeders, even a manager, sit down, eat snacks and win the money.

item.title: Sellsword Tales Demo（新規追加）
item.description: A young warrior leaves home on a journey filled with battles and new encounters. Your choices affect not only the outcome of fights but also the relationships you build. Will they stay friends, or will something more develop? The path is yours to decide…
item.content:encoded:
A young warrior leaves home on a journey filled with battles and new encounters. Your choices affect not only the outcome of fights but also the relationships you build. Will they stay friends, or will something more develop? The path is yours to decide…

item.title: The Adventure of Sunny the hedgehog（新規追加）
item.description: In this 2D platformer you play as a hedgehog named sunny having to facing rats, birds, bullets, and more. Whether its jumping from clouds or the platformers in the sewers, as long as you have the determination, you can become the queen of the entire world.
item.content:encoded:
In this 2D platformer you play as a hedgehog named sunny having to facing rats, birds, bullets, and more. Whether its jumping from clouds or the platformers in the sewers, as long as you have the determination, you can become the queen of the entire world.

item.title: Sorting Game（新規追加）
item.description: Sorting Game is a race-against-the-clock roguelike package sorter, where you must locate packages and sort them into their dedicated zones to increase your score and meet your quota. Take on the role of a human trapped in a digital simulation, and find a way out of the Sorting Game.

item.title: The Null Frequency（新規追加）
item.description: When a mysterious signal disrupts the world, driving people to madness, you and your partner must uncover its source. Trust, courage, and teamwork are your only weapons in a fight against an invisible force that threatens to consume reality itself.
item.content:encoded:
When a mysterious signal disrupts the world, driving people to madness, you and your partner must uncover its source. Trust, courage, and teamwork are your only weapons in a fight against an invisible force that threatens to consume reality itself.

item.title: Boardlike（新規追加）
item.description: The world has perished… Only a few Seeds of Life remain. Use ancient rituals to awaken them, combine the lineage of ancestors, and create a legendary hero. Cross eight deadly regions and reach the source of lost power. The last hope to be born… might just make you humanity’s final chance.
item.content:encoded:

Play through the 1st week.

item.title: Masters（新規追加）
item.description: Masters is a game in which you have to fight with squads of ruthless cyborg "Naits" in cyberpunk setting. Explore the colony, search for secrets, find weapons, choose from several paths, use elevators and the subway to get to the spaceport where a rescue ship will be waiting for you.
item.content:encoded:
Masters is a game in which you have to fight with squads of ruthless cyborg "Naits" in cyberpunk setting. Explore the colony, search for secrets, find weapons, choose from several paths, use elevators and the subway to get to the spaceport where a rescue ship will be waiting for you.

item.title: Eye of the Erime（新規追加）
item.description: Eye of the Erime is a first-person puzzle game where you use a camera to take photos of flowers to manipulate objects temporally and spatially. Traverse a unique underground settlement, solve puzzles, find a way to save your mother, and escape the caves.

item.title: Free Lottery（新規追加）
item.description: Free Lotto​​ is an idle placement game requiring zero operation. It automatically triggers ​​lottery ticket drops​​ at intervals, where low-tier tickets can be synthesized into higher-tier ones, and vice versa via ​​lossless decomposition​​—ensuring no resource waste.
item.content:encoded:
Free Lotto​​ is an idle placement game requiring zero operation. It automatically triggers ​​lottery ticket drops​​ at intervals, where low-tier tickets can be synthesized into higher-tier ones, and vice versa via ​​lossless decomposition​​—ensuring no resource waste.

item.title: Pawnbroker Simulator（新規追加）
item.description: Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!

item.title: Hollow Ground（新規追加）
item.description: Play as four mercenaries as they descend into the Epsilon9 bunker. Navigate 60+ handcrafted labyrinthine levels, purchase upgrades, and destroy chaos manifest: The Machine. The blend of old-school arcade action and true focus on tactics sets this game apart from an ordinary shooter.
item.content:encoded:
Play as four mercenaries as they descend into the Epsilon9 bunker. Navigate 60+ handcrafted labyrinthine levels, purchase upgrades, and destroy chaos manifest: The Machine. The blend of old-school arcade action and true focus on tactics sets this game apart from an ordinary shooter.

item.description: First-person homeless crime sandbox. Steal, drink, hallucinate and crush rival bums in chaotic online co-op.

item.title: Devoid（新規追加）
item.description: Devoid is an immersive journey into the medieval world of vampires who feed on human souls. You will have to put an end to their power with the help of sword and magic. Use an arsenal of tools and magical abilities on your way to defeat the most ancient evil.

Devoid is an immersive journey into the medieval world of vampires who feed on human souls. You will have to put an end to their power with the help of sword and magic. Use an arsenal of tools and magical abilities on your way to defeat the most ancient evil.

item.description: In Milaneseria, you'll have to manage your own Milanese restaurant. Your mission is super simple: cook the coolest Milanese in the neighborhood, make sure you always have stock, and leave your customers more than satisfied.

item.title: Druid of Hungwood（新規追加）
item.description: The village of Hungwood is under attack! But where are all the heroes? An evil knight has imprisoned them all, allowing enemies to wreak havoc! It's up to the merchant/leaf-caster Rodin to form a group of NPCs formidable enough to rescue the heroes and save Hungwood! A Lust to Win RPG/Visual Novel!
item.content:encoded:
The village of Hungwood is under attack! But where are all the heroes? An evil knight has imprisoned them all, allowing enemies to wreak havoc! It's up to the merchant/leaf-caster Rodin to form a group of NPCs formidable enough to rescue the heroes and save Hungwood! A Lust to Win RPG/Visual Novel!

item.description: Faced with aggressive detectives, I—"Zilin·SAI"—seemed unable to clear my suspicions. At the critical moment, a mysterious caller contacted me: "I can help you, but the price is to go to the mansion where 'demons' reside." A dark fantasy tale of mind games and romance begins now...
item.content:encoded:

item.description: It’s a rogue lite tower defense where you throw skills at endless enemies but with an awkward moral dilemmas, tough questions without easy answers, and bit of sarcastic humor. item.content:encoded:
It’s a rogue lite tower defense where you throw skills at endless enemies but with an awkward moral dilemmas, tough questions without easy answers, and bit of sarcastic humor. I’m not here to shove ideas down your throat. The world is already cruel enough. I’d rather just stay home and make games.

item.title: By The Orchid（新規追加）
item.description: ——并非所有人的青春都是恋爱喜剧。 一心想要融入同学集体，正在攒钱买手机的中学生林曙，受同桌哄骗竟签下了“卖身契”。 她究竟有什么样的企图？
item.content:encoded:
——并非所有人的青春都是恋爱喜剧。 一心想要融入同学集体，正在攒钱买手机的中学生林曙，受同桌哄骗竟签下了“卖身契”。 她究竟有什么样的企图？

item.title: World of Tanks — Sherman VC Firefly Pack (VI British Medium Tank)（新規追加）
item.description: The Sherman VC Firefly packs the legendary 17-pounder gun into the classic M4 chassis. With great penetration and a unique history, this Tier VI medium is as effective in battle as it is iconic.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Journey To The Center Of The Lost Waterpark Demo（新規追加）
item.description: In this first-person experience you visit the world of The Lost Waterparks for a demonstration of what the full version has in store for you. This short adventure leads you through eerie and beautiful surroundings with puzzles and obstacles while you get familiar with this outer-worldly place.
item.content:encoded:
In this first-person experience you visit the world of The Lost Waterparks for a demonstration of what the full version has in store for you. This short adventure leads you through eerie and beautiful surroundings with puzzles and obstacles while you get familiar with this outer-worldly place.

item.title: World of Tanks — Škoda T 27 Pack (VIII Czechoslovakian Medium Tank)（新規追加）
item.description: The T 27 was part of a project to harmonize the Czechoslovakian fleet, which, at the end of the gruelling Second World War, was a jumbled and international mixture of armored vehicles. This tank is an autoloader, so you can fire bursts at your enemy before they even know you're there!
item.content:encoded:
The T 27 was part of a project to harmonize the Czechoslovakian fleet, which, at the end of the gruelling Second World War, was a jumbled and international mixture of armored vehicles. This tank is an autoloader, so you can fire bursts at your enemy before they even know you're there!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: World of Tanks — M4A1 Revalorisé Pack (VIII French Medium Tank)（新規追加）
item.description: The M4A1 Revalorisé is the French twist on the M4 Sherman, which the country received from the U.S. through the MDAP program after WWII. The goal was to improve the firepower, and it worked!
item.content:encoded:
The M4A1 Revalorisé is the French twist on the M4 Sherman, which the country received from the U.S. through the MDAP program after WWII. The goal was to improve the firepower, and it worked!

item.title: The Last Key（新規追加）
item.description: The Last Key is a straight forward casual survival horror game. With 12 levels per difficulty, and AI driven monsters so every time you play the experience will be different. Search for items to help you survive and lost keys to unlock doors. Escape and win your life, or fail and be stuck forever.
item.content:encoded:
The Last Key is a straight forward casual survival horror game. With 12 levels per difficulty, and AI driven monsters so every time you play the experience will be different. Search for items to help you survive and lost keys to unlock doors. Escape and win your life, or fail and be stuck forever.

item.title: Murky（新規追加）
item.description: Murky is a narrative puzzle adventure where you cast spells, alter time to create new timelines, and join curious creatures on a journey to rediscover your past and escape a world stuck in a three-day cycle.
item.content:encoded:
Murky is a narrative puzzle adventure where you cast spells, alter time to create new timelines, and join curious creatures on a journey to rediscover your past and escape a world stuck in a three-day cycle.

item.title: Cursed Heroes（新規追加）
item.description: Recruit. Synergize. Unleash your power. Build a party of heroes with unique class combinations. With each run, time moves forward 50 years and future generations judge your incarnations: revered as legends… or rejected as curses.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Star Trucker - Star Truck Owner's Manual（新規追加）
item.description: Open the Star Truck Owner’s Manual to find everything you need to get started with the Starmaster 790 - from system diagrams and maintenance tips to top-notch pre-trip check advice. There’s even a handy galaxy guide and CB chatter cheat sheet, so you’re ready for anything the galaxy throws your way!
item.content:encoded:
Open the Star Truck Owner’s Manual to find everything you need to get started with the Starmaster 790 - from system diagrams and maintenance tips to top-notch pre-trip check advice. There’s even a handy galaxy guide and CB chatter cheat sheet, so you’re ready for anything the galaxy throws your way!

item.title: Falcon Fall™（新規追加）
item.description: Dropped deep in hostile territory with no backup and no way out but through. Every street is a kill zone, every shadow a threat. Built in UE5 by seasoned VR devs and combat vets, Falcon Fall™ delivers the most unforgiving tactical VR combat experience. Wishlist now - deployment scheduled for 2026.
item.content:encoded:
Dropped deep in hostile territory with no backup and no way out but through. Every street is a kill zone, every shadow a threat. Built in UE5 by seasoned VR devs and combat vets, Falcon Fall™ delivers the most unforgiving tactical VR combat experience. Wishlist now - deployment scheduled for 2026.

item.title: The Greenening Demo（新規追加）
item.description: A short and wholesome incremental journey about exploring and reawakening a forgotten world. Wash away the ashes to discover the secrets hidden beneath, upgrade your versatile watering abilities, and grow your own cozy space garden.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Horse Magic（新規追加）
item.description: Horse Magic is a choice-driven visual novel about Kaiah and her roommate Iris, whose bond is tested by a surreal event. Navigate love, identity, and forbidden desire through branching choices, emotional drama, and futa-themed intimacy.
item.content:encoded:
Horse Magic is a choice-driven visual novel about Kaiah and her roommate Iris, whose bond is tested by a surreal event. Navigate love, identity, and forbidden desire through branching choices, emotional drama, and futa-themed intimacy.
